{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear nighthawk m1 mr1100 1 .png |image1_size = 150px |caption = Nighthawk M1 - 4Gx Gigabit LTE Mobile Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.netgear.com/home/mobile-wifi/hotspots/mr1100/ |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/MR1100 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = Nighthawk M1 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = MR1100 |wlclass = AC1300 |series = Nighthawk |type = mobile router, LTE router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY317200378 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;MDM9250;Snapdragon X16; |cpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- CPU1 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = ESMT;FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1, MicroSD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = LTE modem, MicroSD Card slot |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/07/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 276 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA6174A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9377; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 433 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 150 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Currently available for Telstraâ€™s 4GX LTE network in Australia and soon :to be available for AT&T in the US according to FCC documents.
===Specifications (MR1100-1TLAUS for Telstra)=== * Max 1Gbps download speeds & 150Mbps upload speeds * LTE CAT 16, LTE Advanced 4-band CA, 4x4 MIMO * Up to 4x Carrier Aggregation * LTE/4G: 700/900/1800/2100/2600 MHz * 3G: 850/900/1900/2100 MHz * Battery: 5040mAh for up to 24 hours of use * Dimensions: 105.5 (L) x 105.5 (W) x 20.35 (H) mm * Weight: 240g (with battery)
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://4pda.ru/forum/index.php?showtopic=778715&view=findpost&p=60717769 ''Netgear MR1100'' on '''4pda''' forums] :- [[Qualcomm]] MDM9250 - Snapdragon X16 LTE Modem ([https://www.qualcomm.com/products/snapdragon/modems/4g-lte/x16 MDM9250]) :- [[Qualcomm]] WTR5975 - Gigabit LTE (Category 16) RF transceiver, : (single-chip RF companion to Qualcomm Snapdragon X16 LTE modem) :- ''Qorvo'' QM58101 - MMPA (Multimode Multi-band Power Amplifier) :- ''ESMT'' (''Elite Semi'') FM6BD4G4GXA-1.8BLE (Flash/RAM, BGA162) : 4Gb NAND Flash (512Mb x8) + 4Gb mobile DDRII SDRAM (128Mb x32) :- [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A - 2T2R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) :- [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377 - 1T1R 802.11abgn/ac (MU-MIMO) :- [[Qualcomm]] PMD9655 - Power Management Integrated Circuit (PMIC) :- [[Qualcomm]] SMB1356 - Qualcomm Quick Charge 2.0 Controller :- [[Realtek]] RTS5411 - USB 3.1 Gen1 4x Port Hub (USB Type C) :- ''Genesys Logic'' GL3224 - USB 3.1 Gen1 Dual/Single LUN Controller
===Reviews=== *[https://www.whistleout.com.au/Broadband/Reviews/netgear-nighthawk-m1-review ''Netgear Nighthawk M1 Review'' on '''WhistleOut'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-m1-gigabit-lte-router-test/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1 Test'' on '''4G LTE Mall'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/tag/netgear-nighthawk-m1-specs/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1 Specs'' on '''4G LTE Mall''']
===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/10/17/qualcomm-telstra-ericsson-and-netgear-announce-worlds-first-gigabit-class Press Release on '''Qualcomm'''] *[https://www.telstra.com.au/broadband/mobile-broadband/nighthawk-m1 ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M1'' on '''Telstra'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11097/netgear-nighthawk-m1-lte-cat-16-router-1-gbps-carrier-aggregation ''Netgear Nighthawk M1: LTE Cat 16 Router up to 1 Gbps'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11191/netgear-nighthawk-m1-shows-up-at-mwc-coming-to-europe-in-mid2017-but-there-is-a-catch ''MWC 2017: Netgear Nighthawk M1 Coming to Europe in Mid-2017, But'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.pcper.com/reviews/Mobile/Gigabit-LTE-Path-5G-Qualcomm-Ericsson-Netgear-and-Telstra/Netgear-Nighthawk-M1-Mobile ''Gigabit LTE: The Path to 5G with Qualcomm, Ericsson, Netgear and Telstra'' on '''PC|Per'''] *[https://www.4gltemall.com/blog/netgear-nighthawk-m2-vs-m1/ ''NETGEAR Nighthawk M2 VS M1'' on '''4G LTE Blog''']
